text: Connex was a train operator in Melbourne, Australia. They ran all Melbourne railway lines, and took over all M-Train services on 16 April 2003, however Metro Trains Melbourne took over all Connex's services on 30 November 2009. All Connex services used the Metcard fare system. == Other websites == Official website Category:Australian transport companies Category:Public transport in Melbourne Category:Rail transport in Australia
title: Connex Melbourne
